title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 10
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Imagination, dinosaurs, horses and the beach
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Michael who shares his love of imagination; Ivan and Luke really like Dinosaurs; Madelaine from Clayton is a BIG fan of Horses; and Michelle from Frankston's favourite thing is absolutely the beach.
